```php
<?php

// get cURL resource
$ch = curl_init();

// set url
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl/api/user/login');

// set method
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');

// return the transfer as a string
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);

// set headers
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authority: partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl',
  'Pragma: no-cache',
  'Cache-Control: no-cache',
  'Sec-Ch-Ua: " Not A;Brand";v="99", "Chromium";v="96", "Google Chrome";v="96"',
  'X-Ig-Changeset: a023a4be64bb3951eb5619ab99e24774d5dbdb73',
  'Sec-Ch-Ua-Mobile: ?0',
  'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/96.0.4664.110 Safari/537.36',
  'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8',
  'Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*',
  'X-Ig-Token: null',
  'Sec-Ch-Ua-Platform: "Linux"',
  'Origin: https://partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl',
  'Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin',
  'Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors',
  'Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty',
  'Referer: https://partner.system.netsalesmedia.pl/app/index.html',
  'Accept-Language: en,zh-CN;q=0.9,zh;q=0.8',
  'Cookie: ; _etid=ca7b4c0259fabf7b32f45821fb71b5689ac04244; sso=eyJhcGlCYXNlVXJsIjoiYXBpLnN5c3RlbS5uZXRzYWxlc21lZGlhLnBsIiwibG9naW4iOnsidHlwZSI6IlBBUlRORVIiLCJ1c2VybmFtZSI6Im5zbS5wYXJ0bmVyc0BicmFuZHJld2FyZC5jb20iLCJ1c2VySWQiOjQ5NjIyMywic2VjcmV0IjoiJDJ5JDEwJEJFNTFGc011WkZGYWdobHVSXC9TRVEuOGVNMDQzXC9qNUJuOE5veERzcWlhRzFHXC9yUUV6V0NlIn19; sso_logout=logout; IGT_PARTNER=7c4c6a03f3250c728a845525d5e7b3ad',
  'Accept-Encoding: gzip',
]);

// json body
$json_array = [
  'username' => 'nsm.partners@brandreward.com',
  'password' => 'q9Js&TaC=^'
]; 
$body = json_encode($json_array);

// set body
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $body);

// send the request and save response to $response
$response = curl_exec($ch);

// stop if fails
if (!$response) {
  die('Error: "' . curl_error($ch) . '" - Code: ' . curl_errno($ch));
}

echo 'HTTP Status Code: ' . curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE) . PHP_EOL;
echo 'Response Body: ' . $response . PHP_EOL;

// close curl resource to free up system resources 
curl_close($ch);
```
